name: TREES' ADVENTURE - Demo
description:
SUPPORT THE GAME ON PATREON

PLAY THE DEMO AT NEWGROUNDS

TREES' ADVENTURE is a 2D platformer created by Unlimited Trees that is currently in development. It is a direct sequel to 'UNITRES Dreams', expanding on the concepts from that game and going in a different, more strange direction.

You play as "Unlimited Trees" (unrelated to the actual person by the same name). Trees is on an adventure... but where to is not exactly up to you. This demo includes a tutorial level as well as one full level, "Workbench Island".  Use Trees' abilities to soar this strange, peaceful world. Whether you're speeding through or taking the time to explore the large areas the island presents, there's a lot to see in this universe...
